<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 2"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Savior Spike](/Equipment.aspx?ID=232)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Abjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=2" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Force" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=75" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Talisman" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=155" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 569 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Price** 7 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** affixed to armor

</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Free Action" /><row>command</row></row>

 

**Trigger** You attempt to Grab an Edge but haven't rolled

**Requirement** You're an expert in Reflex
</row>

</column>

---

This pyramid-shaped spike is attached to an armor’s chest piece. When you activate the spike, it shoots a strand of force to help you gain purchase. If you roll a success on the triggering attempt, you get a critical success instead (if you roll a critical failure, you get a failure instead). 

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
